title: The Great Reset Has Arrived | Guest: Daniel Horowitz | 1/11/22
description:
Glenn Beck’s newest book, “The Great Reset,” is out now. Glenn examines a letter from Thomas Jefferson regarding religion and reason. Glenn explains why his new book is vital for every American to read. Everything the Left does is about control. Glenn discusses how some of the conflicting and hypocritical outcomes of the COVID pandemic are due to the Great Reset. Glenn surveys all the different fact-checkers that exist. Glenn discusses how the Great Reset will bring about modern monetary theory, which would give the government massive power over every corporation in America. Blaze podcast host Daniel Horowitz of "Conservative Review" joins to share how Twitter banned him after he reported about a vaccinated hospitalization.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
